summary: A lazy postman puts his nose where it doesn't belong.
cast: Robert Skjærstad|Andrine Sæther|Per Egil Aske|Eli Anne Linnestad|Trond Høvik|Ådne Olav Sekkelsten|Trond Fausa|Henriette Steenstrup|Bjørn Sundquist|Karl Sundby|Rolf Arly Lund|Geir Morstad|Rolf Dolven|Helge Sveen|Geir-Atle Johnsen|Henrik Høie|Harald Kolaas|Marit Syversen|John Ivar Bye|Runar Johannessen|Bentine Holm|Jan Zaborowski|Suzanne Paalgard|Lars Frogner|Rina Kelly|Henning Syverud|Terje Tollefsen
title: Budbringeren
